Naga moved a bit on his tail.

Naga: I am not sure I am the best person to answer your questions, 
Windlord. I can tell you that we Strikers came here to fulfill a 
mission, but revealing that mission to you will have to be determined 
by my commander and friend, Tyrael. He is in charge here, after all.

ask
